featured.text: A new analysis of satellite-based data has given precisely the rate 21 which the country is losing size as it pushes northward against the Himalayas.
According to the analysis, the 22 between India’s southern and northern tips shrinks by 2 cm every year.

definition.zh_def: 分析；對事物進行詳細的檢查和解釋。
definition.en_def: The detailed examination and interpretation of something.
definition.example: The analysis of the data revealed important trends.
